name: BDSM - On a Leash LoRA
description:
Fifth entry in my BDSM related series of LoRA.

If you feel like supporting my work, please consider visiting my Patreon to get access to more detailed instructions on how to get the most out of my models and have a say in what's up next: Link.

Use 'leashed' as the trigger word.

Update: V2 is much more reliable in getting the leash right. Even in shots from a bit further away, which I'm quite happy with. V1 was so hit and miss, I don't know why I even uploaded it tbh.

Recommended LoRA strength is around 0.7.

Based on UberRealisticPornMerge.

If you like this you might also like my other LoRAs.
